summary: ALTHOUGH THIS ISSUE IS IDENTIFIED FOR CERTAIN 2015 ROGUES, MINE IS NOT AMONG THEM, HOWEVER I AM EXPERIENCING THE FOLLOWING:   THE FRONT SEAT PASSENGER OCCUPANT CLASSIFICATION SYSTEM LIGHT IN THE DASH IS LIT UP WHETHER OR NOT AN OCCUPANT IS IN THE PASSENGER SEAT. IT STARTED TO COME ON INTERMITTENTLY WHEN THE SEAT WAS OCCUPIED AND EMPTY AND NOW IT STAYS ON CONTINUOUSLY ONCE THE ENGINE IS STARTED.
